body_html: @jbarker-nvidia i'm sorry i missed your comment and it's been 9 days (that's embarassing). I dont have good ideas on what to call it, but how about: nn.functional.unfold, or nn.functional.d2col? If you propose something, I'm fine with it too. and thanks for the upcoming PR!

body: @jbarker-nvidia i'm sorry i missed your comment and it's been 9 days (that's embarassing). I dont have good ideas on what to call it, but how about: `nn.functional.unfold`, or `nn.functional.d2col`? If you propose something, I'm fine with it too. and thanks for the upcoming PR!
